@id.description: The identifier for the Geological Context object.

@type.description: The type of the object, in this case ods:GeologicalContext

dwc:earliestEonOrLowestEonothem.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic eon or lowest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name ("Precambrian") attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:latestEonOrHighestEonothem.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic eon or highest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name ("Precambrian") attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:earliestEraOrLowestErathem.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic era or lowest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:latestEraOrHighestErathem.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic era or highest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:earliestPeriodOrLowestSystem.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic period or lowest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:latestPeriodOrHighestSystem.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic period or highest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:earliestEpochOrLowestSeries.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic epoch or lowest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:latestEpochOrHighestSeries.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic epoch or highest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:earliestAgeOrLowestStage.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic age or lowest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:latestAgeOrHighestStage.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic age or highest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:lowestBiostratigraphicZone.description: The full name of the lowest possible geological biostratigraphic zone of the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:highestBiostratigraphicZone.description: The full name of the highest possible geological biostratigraphic zone of the stratigraphic horizon from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:lithostratigraphicTerms.description: The combination of all litho-stratigraphic names for the rock from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:group.description: The full name of the lithostratigraphic group from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:formation.description: The full name of the lithostratigraphic formation from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:member.description: The full name of the lithostratigraphic member from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected

dwc:bed.description: The full name of the lithostratigraphic bed from which the ods:MaterialEntity was collected
